text:
Louisville, KY area - Director of IT - Data Management for multi-thousand person customer contact company.

http://www.linkedin.com/jobs?viewJob=&jobId=2637014

Director of IT, Data Management, leads the overall implementation of business intelligence initiatives, overseeing data warehouse and data mart development and operations by practicing expertise in the DW/DM life cycles, including designing,developing, deploying, and governing all facets of the data warehouse including dimensional and relational models.
